meanings.sent2: Ice cream is my fave dessert.
meanings.sent3: My fave teddy bear always makes me smile.
meanings.sent4: The fave book on my shelf is a treasure.
meanings.sent5: The fave song played on repeat in my head.

meanings.definition: To prefer or choose as a favorite
meanings.sent1: I fave spending time with my family.
meanings.sent3: I fave to eat dessert before dinner sometimes.
meanings.sent4: He faves the path less traveled.
meanings.sent5: They fave to watch the sunset by the beach.
